scripts.build:gemini: cd 01-security-platform/core && npm run build:dev && cd ../cli && npm run build:dev && cd ../.. && node .build/scripts/build.js
scripts.build: cd 01-security-platform/core && npm run build && cd ../cli && npm run build && cd ../.. && node .build/scripts/build.js
scripts.build:no-patch-esbuild: cd 01-security-platform/core && npm run build && cd ../cli && npm run build
scripts.build:dev: cd 01-security-platform/core && npm run build:dev && cd ../cli && npm run build:dev
scripts.test:unit: cd 01-security-platform/core && npm test && cd ../cli && npm test
scripts.test:ci: npm run build:dev && cd 01-security-platform/core && npm run test:ci && cd ../cli && npm run test:ci
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build:dev && npm run preflight:unit && npm run test:e2e:only
scripts.update-package-version: node .build/scripts/version.js && cd 01-security-platform/core && npm run update-package-version && cd ../cli && npm run update-package-version
scripts.prepublish: node .build/scripts/prepublish.js && cd 01-security-platform/core && npm run prepublish && cd ../cli && npm run prepublish
scripts.postpublish: cd 01-security-platform/core && npm run postpublish && cd ../cli && npm run postpublish
scripts.preflight: npm run clean && npm install && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run typecheck && npm test
scripts.preflight:unit: npm run clean && npm install && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run typecheck && npm run test:unit
scripts.typecheck: cd 01-security-platform/core && npm run typecheck && cd ../cli && npm run typecheck
